title: The Burial within Towns' Limits Act
title_en: The Burial within Towns' Limits Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Discontinuance of Burials
(Montego Bay Methodist Cemetery) Order, 1955.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. From and after the 1st day of June, 1955, burials in the Methodist
Cenietery situated at Gloucester Avenue in the town of Montego
Bay shall be discontinued wholly.
